case.name: Dizzykaze
case.description: Shimakaze has taken a blow to the head, and will be very dizzy for the round.

trigger.state: -aaaaAAAAAR-! I-I think I'm gonna be sick...
-aaaaAAAAAR-! I feel like I just sailed through a typhoon...
-aaaaAAAAAR-! My head's still spinning..!
-aaaaAAAAAR-! Awawawaw...
-aaaaAAAAAR-! T-t-that one really shook me up...
-aaaaAAAAAR-! T-the world just turned upside down all of a sudden!

case.name: Japanese
case.description: Shimakaze's speech had temporarily reverted to Japanese, and has only just come back.

trigger.state: $%^#(*! -llo? Am I coming through clearly now?
:"_!(@+/ -erstand me now? Ah, we're back.
`%{|;<.| -tion systems are back up now, I think.
\{].'_=@* -ower's never been damaged like that before. I'll have to be more careful.

case.name: Rensouhou Returns
case.description: Shimakaze's little robot friend, who disappeared at the start of the game, returns.

trigger.state: Haah, haah. Oh, Rensouhou-chan. C'mere.
Haah, haah. Rensouhou-chan? Were you worried about me?
Oh, Rensouhou-chan. Haah, I'm okay. Just a bit tired.
Didn't I ask you to wait outside, Rensouhou-chan? Well, doesn't matter anymore.

case.name: Rensouhou Leaves
case.description: Shimakaze's little robot friend is sent away.

trigger.state: Rensouhou-chan! Don't wander too far away from the room, or you'll get lost again.
We'll have some races when we return to the base, okay, Rensouhou-chan?
Rensouhou-chan, don't get into any fights, okay?
Rensouhou-chan, even if someone makes you mad, you can't open fire on them.
I'll finish up as quick as a flash, Rensouhou-chan, so wait patiently outside.

case.name: Shimakaze Stripping
case.description: Shimakaze's gloves burn away instead of being stripped off. The rest of her clothing will disappear in a similar fashion.

trigger.state: A little bit of damage here and there, but I'm still fine!
No damage to anything vital. I can keep playing!
Just gotta wait for the damage control fairies to do their work.
I won't even need time in the docks to repair something like this.
If it's just this, Akashi will have me fixed up in no time.
It's pretty generous to call something like this a hit.
